00001 #include "hist.h"
00002 
00003 //1D histogram
00004 hist::hist(long int numBucket, long int lowerBound, long int upperBound) {
00005         _numBucket_x = numBucket;
00006         _numBucket_y = 1;
00007         _lowerBound_x = lowerBound;
00008         _upperBound_x = upperBound;
00009         _lowerBound_y = -1;
00010         _upperBound_y = -1;
00011         _histMat = new long int* [_numBucket_y];
00012         for (int i = 0; i < _numBucket_y; i++) {
00013                 _histMat[i] = new long int [_numBucket_x];
00014                 //Initialize
00015                 for (int j = 0; j < _numBucket_x; j++) {
00016                         _histMat[i][j] = 0;
00017                 }
00018         }
00019 
00020         _step_x = floor((double)(_upperBound_x-_lowerBound_x)/(double)_numBucket_x);
00021         _step_y = -1;
00022 }
00023 
00024 //2D histogram
00025 hist::hist(long int numBucket_x, long int lowerBound_x, long int upperBound_x, long int numBucket_y, long int lowerBound_y, long int upperBound_y) {
00026         _numBucket_x = numBucket_x;
00027         _numBucket_y = numBucket_y;
00028         _lowerBound_x = lowerBound_x;
00029         _upperBound_x = upperBound_x;
00030         _lowerBound_y = lowerBound_y;
00031         _upperBound_y = upperBound_y;
00032         _histMat = new long int* [_numBucket_y];
00033         for (int i = 0; i < _numBucket_y; i++) {
00034                 _histMat[i] = new long int [_numBucket_x];
00035                 //Initialize
00036                 for (int j = 0; j < _numBucket_x; j++) {
00037                         _histMat[i][j] = 0;
00038                 }
00039         }
00040         _step_x = floor((double)(_upperBound_x-_lowerBound_x)/(double)_numBucket_x);
00041         _step_y = floor((double)(_upperBound_y-_lowerBound_y)/(double)_numBucket_y);
00042 }
00043 
00044 hist::~hist() {
00045         delete [] _histMat;
00046 }
00047 
00048 //TODO redo this function
00049 void hist::addElem(long int elem) {
00050         long int indx = findIndx(elem);
00051         if (!(indx < _numBucket_x && indx > -1)) printf("index = %ld,%ld,%ld\n",indx,_step_x,elem);
00052         Assert(indx < _numBucket_x && indx > -1);
00053         _histMat[0][indx]++;
00054 }
00055 
00056 long int hist::findIndx(long int elem) {
00057         return floor((long double)elem/(long double)_step_x);
00058 }
00059 
00060 void hist::report(FILE* file, string histName) {
00061         long int total = 0;
00062         fprintf(file, "----------------%s\n", histName.c_str());
00063         printf("----------------%s\n", histName.c_str());
00064         for (int j = 0; j < _numBucket_y; j++) {
00065                 for (int i = 0; i < _numBucket_x; i++) {
00066                         fprintf(file, "%ld, ", _histMat[j][i]);
00067                         printf("%ld, ", _histMat[j][i]);
00068                         total += _histMat[j][i];
00069                 }
00070                 printf("\t");
00071         }
00072         printf("\n");
00073         fprintf(file, "\n");
00074 }
00075 
00076 void hist::report() {
00077         long int total = 0;
00078         for (int j = 0; j < _numBucket_y; j++) {
00079                 for (int i = 0; i < _numBucket_x; i++) {
00080                         printf("%ld, ", _histMat[j][i]);
00081                         total += _histMat[j][i];
00082                 }
00083                 printf("\t");
00084         }
00085         printf("\n");
00086 }
